html.p: Splunk 6.2 introduces a new home page to provide users quicker access to relevant data, allowing users to select any existing dashboard to use as their custom home page.

ul.li: Users can navigate, and choose an existing dashboard from within the home page itself
Alternatively, users can mkae any dashboard their home page from the dashboard listing page, or within the dashboard itself
This selection gets saved to the user's user-prefs.conf
